about.title: About Movies.to
about.description: Movies.to is your personal guide to the world of cinema. We help you discover hidden gems, track your favorites, and connect with fellow movie lovers. Built with passion by a team that believes great movies deserve to be found.
about.storyParagraph1: Movies.to began on a rainy Friday evening in 2024, when our founder spent two hours scrolling through streaming services, unable to find something to watch. "There has to be a better way," they thought. That frustration became our mission.
about.storyParagraph2: We assembled a small but passionate team of developers, designers, and film enthusiasts. Together, we built Movies.to from the ground up, combining cutting-edge technology with a deep understanding of what movie lovers actually need: discovery, organization, and community.
about.storyParagraph3: What started as a weekend project has grown into a platform serving thousands of users worldwide. Every day, we help people discover their next favorite film, whether it's a Hollywood blockbuster, an indie gem, or a foreign classic they never knew existed.
about.storyParagraph4: We're not done yet. Our roadmap includes AI-powered recommendations, social features to share your discoveries, and integrations with your favorite streaming platforms. We're building the future of movie discovery, one film at a time.
about.techDescription: Movies.to is built using cutting-edge web technologies to ensure a fast, reliable, and enjoyable experience. We use React for a responsive interface, Tailwind CSS for beautiful design, and TMDB API for comprehensive movie data.
about.communityDescription: Discover your next favorite movie, create personalized watchlists, and connect with fellow movie enthusiasts. Sign up today!
about.haveQuestions: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To eliminate the paradox of choice. We believe everyone deserves to find their perfect movie without endless scrolling. Our tools help you discover films tailored to your mood, taste, and time.

passion.title: Our Passion
passion.description: Cinema is more than entertainment—it's an art form that shapes culture, sparks conversations, and creates memories. We're dedicated to celebrating every film, from mainstream hits to underground masterpieces.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To build the world's most intelligent movie discovery platform. We're investing in AI recommendations, community features, and partnerships that make finding your next watch effortless and exciting.

team.bio: Passionate web developer from Morocco, constantly learning and building amazing things with code. Specializes in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.
